Description.Text: Hotel Ai Due Fanali is a stylish 3-star property offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Venice. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to the Grand Canal and the Fondaco dei Turchi palazzo. Santa Croce is a varied district, its eastern half largely medieval, whilst its west contains the most modern part of the city. Nearby places of interest include the Baroque palazzo and modern art museum Ca' Pesaro, medieval Church of San Giacomo dell'Orio, 13th-century Fondaco dei Turchi palazzo and the public square Piazzale Roma, home to the bus station. Riva de Biasio water bus stop is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Venice destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are cosy and comfortably furnished. Amenities include a work desk, mini-bar, flat-screen satellite TV and an en-suite bathroom. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning, and guest can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24 hour front desk.
